00096         void PlayNthAnim(BuildingAnimSlot Slot, int dwUnk = 0) {
00097                 bool Damaged = !this->IsGreenHP();
00098                 bool Garrisoned = this->GetOccupantCount() > 0;
00099 
00100                 BuildingAnimStruct *AnimData = &this->Type->BuildingAnim[Slot];
00101                 char *AnimName = NULL;
00102                 if(Damaged) {
00103                         AnimName = AnimData->Damaged;
00104                 } else if(Garrisoned) {
00105                         AnimName = AnimData->Garrisoned;
00106                 } else {
00107                         AnimName = AnimData->Anim;
00108                 }
00109                 if(AnimName && *AnimName) {
00110                         this->PlayAnim(AnimName, Slot, Damaged, Garrisoned, dwUnk);
00111                 }
00112         }
00113

00143         // helpers
00144         bool HasSuperWeapon(int Type) {
00145                 if(this->Type->HasSuperWeapon(Type)) {
00146                         return true;
00147                 }
00148                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00149                         if(BuildingTypeClass * BType = this->Upgrades[i]) {
00150                                 if(BType->HasSuperWeapon(Type)) {
00151                                         return true;
00152                                 }
00153                         }
00154                 }
00155                 return false;
00156         }
